sentence: In early trading on Wednesday, shares of UnitedHealth Group topped the list of the day's best performing Dow Jones Industrial Average components, trading up 3.1%.
Year to date, UnitedHealth Group has lost about 5.2% of its value.
And the worst performing Dow component thus far on the day is American Express, trading down 6.4%.
American Express is lower by about 33.5% looking at the year to date performance.
Two other components making moves today are Dow, trading down 6.4%, and Procter & Gamble, trading up 1.4% on the day.
